channel.title: 155 - "A Place Called Home" - Histories of Spatial Discrimination and Ethnic Migration in the United States on GIS @ Harvard Libraries
channel.description: Recent content in 155 - "A Place Called Home" - Histories of Spatial Discrimination and Ethnic Migration in the United States on GIS @ Harvard Libraries

item.title: Fall 2022 Harvard Map Collection
item.description: GIS definitions. John Snow cholera map, 1854. John Snow cholera map, overlaid by a modern-day GIS heatmap layer. Map of Boston from 1743 . GIS heatmap of density of restaurants in Boston. Analyze Boston , Boston’s open data portal. Vision Zero dataset, open as a table. Bike crash data displayed visually as individual points in GIS software. OldNYC: Mapping Historic Photographs at the NYPL . GIS data layers diagram.
